name: Arrive
desc: Triggers when players attrive a room. trigger_obj field: room's id.

name: Die
desc: Triggers when characters die. trigger_obj field: killer's id.

name: Kill
desc: Triggers when players kill mobs. trigger_obj field: mob's id.

name: Traverse
desc: Triggers just before players traverse an exit. trigger_obj field: exit's id.

name: Action
desc: Triggers when characters act to an object. trigger_obj field: object's id
